price: 本当にわれら*は、最下層の天を、星々という装飾で飾った。
arabic: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلۡكَوَاكِبِ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: innā zayyannā al-samāa al-dun'yā bizīnatin al-kawākibi
